description:
The invincible young man faced the raging wind and waves with a pounding heart and infinite possibilities. Across the continent under the sky, a ray of light pierced the heavens from the swordmaster of Qingshan Mountain! After Grandmaster Jing Yang ascended, the young man Jiu Jing left his mountain home to head for Gushan Mountain. Famed for his handsome looks and lazy attitude, Jiu Jing took a different path for his cultivation, always looking for shortcuts. There were many suspicious signs behind Jing Yang's ascension. What could be hiding in the fog that surround the peaks of Qingshan Mountain?

(Source: Bilibili, translated)
